Aviran Mordo - Head of Engineering at Wix

ABSTRACT
Wix.com started the journey toward DevOps and a microservices solution about 5 years ago when we switched from a monolithic application to a microservices-based systemâ€”a transition that took two full years to complete, with many lessons learned along [...]

title: Journey from Monolith to Microservices & DevOps
